name: COMMUNITY_RESRC_REVIEWED
description: This table contains the last review information for community resources.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: CBO_REVIEW_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the most recent instant community resources were reviewed.

columns.name: CBO_REVIEW_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the most recent user who reviewed community resources.

columns.name: CBO_REVIEW_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: CBO_REVIEW_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Stores the most recent CSN of the encounter in which community resources were reviewed.
